p.span: Communications from MPS, Information, Updates, Links/Resources
Food Service, Educational Supports, Links/Resources, Travel Reporting
Links to Elementary, Intermediate, Middle, & High School Plans

strong.span: All Oklahoma Public Schools Are Closed Through The End Of The 2019-2020 School Year

p.span: At this time, all schools and offices are not scheduled to reopen until the 2020-2021 school year begins
We will be working on plans for PreK Roundup, Central Enrollment, & more - those will be communicated ASAP.
in the event of an urgent need or emergency, and we will respond as soon as possible.

div.h3: Empowering Today to Achieve a Better Tomorrow

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Mustang Public Schools is providing supplemental learning opportunities during this closure which can be found below. We are first and foremost an institution of learning; while these activities are not a replacement for classroom instruction, we are committed to providing educational opportunities for students throughout this closure.

div.span: Please report any broken links to
for an update on our MPS Continuous/Distance Learning Plan.
is a Detailed Overview of our Plan.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We have learned a lot in our first weeks of serving meals during this school closure. We will

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . We are moving to a Monday-Thursday (11am-1pm) service model, though. In doing so, 2 meals will be given out on Thursday. This will help minimize exposure for all.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you in advance for your patience and understanding as we try to best meet the needs of our students within the limits of law/regulation. As always, thank you for your support.

span.style: background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All meals will be delivered in an official Mustang vehicle. Please verify the school logo (AKA Morsey) on the vehicle. With all locations, we ask that participants engage in social distancing and practice proper hygiene before and after meal service pick up. Below is a list of walk-up locations and times.

p.span: We will also continue to provide FREE sack meals (containing a lunch and breakfast) prepared by our child nutrition staff. The schools below will provide curbside service of meals

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: for all MPS students (Monday-Thursday from 11:00am to 1:00pm) for the duration of the school year.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Parents/Students are asked to stay in their vehicles and follow the directions below as well as the signs that will be posted at each site.

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Below are student meal distribution sites; click on the site closest to you for a detailed map of where to pick up at each site.

br.span: (yellow arrows indicate traffic flow; green X is the location of curbside service):
